S04n296:1: imāstāḥ khalu punarbho jinaputrā daśa bodhisattvabhūmayaḥ samāsanirdeśato nirdiṣṭāḥ |
S04n296:6: etā daśa bodhisattvabhūmayaḥ sarvākārasarvajñajñānānugatā draṣṭavyā anupūrvābhimukhatvāt |
S04n296:7: tadyathāpi nāma bho jinaputra anavataptahradaprabhavaṃ pravahadvāri caturbhirmahānadīsrotomukhairjambūdvīpaṃ saṃtarpya akṣayaṃ bhūyo vivṛddhamaprameyāṇāṃ sattvānāmupakārībhūtaṃ yāvanmahāsamudramarpayati,
S04n296:9: evameva bho jinaputra bodhicittamahāhradaprabhavaṃ pravahat kuśalamūlavāri mahāpraṇidhānanadīsrotomukhaiścaturbhiḥ saṃgrahavastubhiḥ sarvasattvadhātu saṃtarpya akṣayaṃ bhūya uttari vivṛddham aprameyāṇāṃ sattvānāmupakārībhūtaṃ yāvatsarvākārasarvajñajñānamahāsamudramarpayati |
S04n296:11: tāḥ khalu bho jinaputra etā daśa bhūmayo buddhajñānaṃ pratītya prajñāyante |
S04n296:12: tadyathāpi nāma bho jinaputra mahāpṛthivīṃ pratītya daśa mahāratnaparvatarājāḥ prajñāyante |
S04n296:13: tadyathā himavān parvatarājo gandhamādano vaidalya ṛṣigiriryugaṃdharo'
S04n296:15: tara bho jinaputra tadyathāpi nāma himavān parvatarāja ākaraḥ sarvabhaiṣajyajātīnāmaparyantaḥ sarvabhaiṣajyajātigrahaṇatayā,
S04n296:16: evameva bho jinaputra pramuditāyāṃ bodhisattvabhūmau sthito bodhisattva ākaro bhavati sarvalaukikakāvyaśāstramantravidyāsthānānāmaparyantaḥ sarvalaukikakāvyaśāstramantravidyopāyena |
S04n296:17: tadyathāpi nāma bho jinaputra gandhamādano mahāparvatarāja ākaraḥ sarvagandhajātīnāmaparyantaḥ sarvagandhajātigrahaṇena,
S04n296:18: evameva bho jinaputra vimalāyāṃ bodhisattvabhūmau sthito bodhisattva ākaro bhavati sarvabodhisattvaśīlasaṃvaracāritragandhānāmaparyantaḥ sarvabodhisattvaśīlasaṃvaracāritragandhasaṃgrahaṇena |
S04n296:19: tadyathāpi nāma bho jinaputra vaidalyo mahāparvatarājaḥ śuddho ratnamaya ākaraḥ sarvaratnajātīnāmaparyantaḥ sarvalaukikaratnajātigrahaṇena,
S04n296:23: tadyathāpi nāma bho jinaputra ṛṣigirirmahāparvatarājaḥ pañcābhijñānāmṛṣīṇāmaparyantaḥ pañcābhijñarṣigaṇanayā,
S04n296:25: tadyathāpi nāma bho jinaputra yugaṃdharo mahāparvatarājaḥ sarvayakṣamaharddhikānāmaparyantaḥ sarvayakṣamaharddhikagaṇanayā,
S04n296:27: tadyathāpi nāma bho aśvakarṇagirirmahāparvatarājaḥ sarvaphalajātīnāmaparyantaḥ sarvaphalajātigrahaṇena,
S04n296:28: evameva bho jinaputra abhimukhyāṃ buddhabhūmau pratītyasamutpādāvatāranirdeśānāmaparyantaḥ śrāvakaphalābhisamayaparipṛcchānirdeśaiḥ |
S04n296:29: tadyathāpi nāma bho jinaputra nimiṃdharo nāma mahāparvatarājaḥ sarvanāgamaharddhikānāmaparyantaḥ sarvanāgamaharddhigaṇanayā,
S04n296:30: evameva bho jinaputra dūraṃgamāyāṃ buddhabhūmau upāyaprajñānirdeśānāmaparyantaḥ pratyekabuddhaphalābhisamayaparipṛcchāanirdeśaiḥ |
S04n296:31: tadyathāpi nāma bho jinaputra cakravālo nāma mahāparvatarājaḥ vaśībhūtānāmaparyanto vaśībhūtagaṇanayā,
S04n296:32: evameva bho jinaputra acalāyāṃ buddhabhūmau sarvabodhisattvavaśitābhinirhārāṇāmaparyanto lokadhātuvibhaktiparipṛcchānirdeśaiḥ |
S04n296:33: tadyathāpi bho jinaputra ketumān nāma mahāparvatarājaḥ asuramaharddhikānāmaparyanto'
S04n296:36: tadyathāpi bho jinaputra sumerurmahāparvatarājaḥ sarvadevamaharddhikānāmaparyantaḥ sarvadevamaharddhikagaṇanayā,
S04n296:37: evameva bho jinaputra dharmameghāyāṃ buddhabhūmau tathāgatabalavaiśaradyāveṇikabuddhadharmāṇāmaparyanto buddhakāyasaṃdarśanaparipṛcchānirdeśaiḥ |
S04n296:38: yathā khalu punarime bho jinaputra daśa mahāratnaparvatā mahāsamudrasaṃbhūtā mahāsamudraprabhāvitāḥ,
S04n296:39: evameva bho jinaputra imā api daśa bhūmayaṃ sarvajñatāsaṃbhūtāḥ sarvajñatāprabhāvitāḥ ||
S04n296:40: tadyathāpi bho jinaputra mahāsamudro daśabhirākāraiḥ saṃkhyāṃ gacchatyasaṃhāryatayā |
S04n296:42: yaduta anupūrvanimnataśca mṛtakuṇapāsaṃvāsataśca anyavārisaṃkhyātyajanataśca ekarasataśca bahuratnataśca gambhīraduravagāhataśca vipulāpramāṇataśca mahābhūtāvāsataśca sthitavelānatikramaṇataśca sarvameghavārisaṃpratyeṣaṇātṛptitaśca,
S04n296:43: evameva bho jinaputra bodhisattvacaryā daśabhirākāraiḥ saṃkhyāṃ gacchatyasaṃhāryatayā |
S04n296:55: tadyathāpi bho jinaputra mahāmaṇiratnaṃ yadā daśa ratnagotrāṇyatikramya abhyutkṣiptaṃ ca bhavati kuśalakarmārasuparitāpitaṃ ca suparipiṇḍitaṃ ca supariśodhitaṃ ca suparyavadāpitaṃ ca sunirviddhaṃ ca ratnasūtrasvāviddhaṃ ca uccavaiḍūryamaṇiratnadaṇḍadhvajāgrāvaropitaṃ ca sarvāvabhāsapramuktaṃ ca rājānujñātaṃ ca bhavati,
S04n296:57: evameva bho jinaputra yadā bodhisattvānāṃ sarvajñatāratnacittotpādo daśāryaratnagotrāṇyatikramyotpanno bhavati dhūtaguṇasaṃlekhaśīlavratatapaḥsuparitāpitaśca dhyānasamādhisamāpattisuparipiṇḍitaśca mārgāṅgākārasupariśodhitaśca upāyābhijñāsuparyavadāpitaśca pratītyasamutpādasunirviddhaśca upāyaprajñāvicitraratnasūtrasvāviddhaśca vaśitāmahāvaiḍūryamaṇiratnadaṇḍadhvajāgrāvaropitaśca sattvacaritapratyavekṣaṇaśrutajñānāvabhāsasaṃprayuktaśca tathāgatadharmarājasamyaksaṃbuddhajñānābhiṣekānugataśca bhavati,
S04n296:60: ayaṃ khalu punarbho jinaputra bodhisattvacaryāsamudānayanaḥ sarvākārasarvajñajñānaguṇasaṃcayo dharmamukhaparivarto nānavaropitakuśālamūlānāṃ sattvānāṃ śravaṇāvabhāsamāgamiṣyati ||
S04n296:61: vimukticandro bodhisattva āha - yeṣāṃ punarbho jinaputra ayaṃ sarvākārasarvajñajñānaguṇasaṃcayo dharmamukhaparivartaḥ śravaṇāvabhāsamāgamiṣyati,
S04n296:63: vajragarbho bodhisattva āha - yāvān bho jinaputra sarvajñajñānasya prabhāvastāvān sarvajñatācittotpādasaṃgrahālambanātpuṇyopacayaḥ syāt |
S04n296:67: na hi bho jinaputra śakyaṃ anyatra bodhisattvena ayaṃ sarvākārasarvajñajñānaguṇasaṃcayo dharmamukhaparivartaḥ śrotuṃ vā adhimoktuṃ vā pratyetuṃ vā udgrahītuṃ vā dhārayituṃ vā saṃdhārayituṃ vā |
S04n296:74: atha khalu tasyāṃ velāyāṃ buddhānubhāvena dharmatāpratilambhena ca daśadiglokadaśabuddhakṣetrakoṭiparamāṇurajaḥsamā lokadhātavaḥ ṣaḍvikāramaṣṭādaśamahānimittamakampanta prākampanta saṃprākampanta |
S04n296:81: divyāśca vastrameghā divyāścūrṇameghā divyā ratnameghā divyā ābharaṇameghā divyā chatrameghā divyā dhvajameghā divyā patākāmeghā abhiprāvarṣan |
S04n296:87: yathā cāsyāṃ lokadhātau cāturdvīpikāyāṃ paranirmitavaśavartino devarājasya vimāne maṇiratnagarbhaprāsāde,
S04n296:88: tathā sarvalokadhātuṣu daśa diśaḥ spharitvā iyameva dharmadeśanā sarvatraiva pravartate sma |
S04n296:89: ...daśabhyo digbhyo daśabuddhakṣetrakoṭiparamāṇurajaḥsamānāṃ lokadhātūnāṃ pareṇa daśabuddhakṣetrakoṭiparamāṇurajaḥsamā bodhisattvā āgacchanti daśadiśaṃ spharantaḥ |
S04n296:90: te ca āgatyaivamāhuḥ - sādhu sādhu bho jinaputra,
S04n296:92: vayamapi bho jinaputra sarve vajragarbhasamanāmakā eva vajraśrīnāmikābhyo nānālokadhātubhya ihāgatā vajradhvajanāmakānāṃ tathāgatānāmantikebhyaḥ |
S04n296:93: sarvāsu ca tāsu lokadhātuṣu iyameva dharmadeśanā pravartate buddhānubhāvena evaṃrūpāsveva parṣatsu |
S04n296:95: te vayaṃ bho jinaputra sākṣībhūtā buddhānubhāvenemāṃ parṣadaṃ saṃprāptāḥ |
S04n296:96: yathā ca bho jinaputra vayamimāṃ lokadhātuṃ saṃprāptāstathā ca daśasu dikṣu sarvalokadhātuṣvekaikasyāṃ lokadhātau cāturdvīpikāyāṃ paranirmitavaśavartibhavane vaśavartino devarājasya vimāne maṇiratnagarbhaprāsāde saṃprāptā iti ||
S04n296:99: āttamanāḥ sā ca sarvāvatī bodhisattvaparṣat sā ca devanāga...śuddhāvāsaparṣad bhagavāṃśca paranirmitavaśavartiṣu deveṣu viharannacirābhisaṃbuddho dvitīye saptāhe vaśavartino devarājasya vimāne maṇiratnagarbhe vajragarbhasya bodhisattvasya bhāṣitamabhyanandanniti ||
S04n296:101: iti śrībodhisattvacaryāprasthāno daśabhūmīśvaro nāma mahāyānasūtraratnarājaḥ samāptaḥ ||
